author: Chris Hale
comment: Didn't get past the "we need your mobile number and ANY email addresses'. Their web site does not need this to track so why the app?.  Could not get past this screen to track one delivery. I personaly use multiple email addresses and phone numbers, but wanted to use the app to track a delicery going to my 90+ year old parents as the driver has been too quick for them when delivering earlier.

Does exactly what you would expect...    It's an app designed to allow you to track your DPD deliveries.  It does this very well with realtime updates, a tracking map once your parcel is out for delivery, an option to add trusted neighbours in case you are out etc...  You can also contact the driver directly to fine tune your delivery.  To those asking why it would ask for multiple emails...  This is so as it can track all your future parcels from whatever store you've signed up to with whichever email.    Otherwise it can only track orders placed with the one email account you provide it.

author: Ruth Dixon
comment: Brilliant app, tells you exactly when your parcel is being delivered & who by.  Easy to change delivery options (change day, deliver to shop, safe place or neighbour).  Organised page with all your orders.  Only down side is live chat is automated sometimes so doesn't provide much help.

author: Chris Jones
comment: Ok. Sometimes it shows me when my deliveries are coming. Sometimes it doesn't. Despite all my parcels coming from Amazon with the same details. Even with a tracking number, it is not possible to add details for a parcel which is not automatically displayed.  My other big gripe is the way that they spell their app name. Not under d for DPD. Not under p for parcels. Not under d for delivery. Not even under m for the frustrating "my DPD" cliché. No, they choose to file the app under y for "your" DPD. I'm sure there is an executive out there with only one app on their phone who thinks that this is a good and clever idea.

author: Gareth Ford
comment: Have used fine for most but had unexpected early delivery on a Sunday and was out. Tried to use the deliver to safe place and had to then choose a date but had NO CHOICE FOR SAME DAY, I had only 3 days away.  What's the point of giving permission to leave in a safe place if it can't be the same day, come on.....in 3 days time it'll then let a late delivery.  Dpd decided to deliver over weekend EARLY so why be punished for it?

author: Geoff Littler
comment: DPD as a company are absolutely fantastic. The DPD app however is worse than poor. I frequently get an error message 'your connection is slower  than usual' In spite of uninstalling and reinstalling the application multiple times it still constantly fails to perform. Avoid this application it is awful.

author: Robert Diren
comment: Decent as long as you have the sender put your phone number on the delivery address as that's the only way it works. Shame it can't pick up my delivery based on my name or even email. Also another suggestion is to have the ability to input it manually as herms has this ability when expecting a delivery from them.

author: Helen Sullivan
comment: App worked really well and kept track of my parcel until it arrived at the expected time. It saved me staying in all day waiting for something when you have no clue when it's coming. I could see where the driver was on his route and the planned delivery time was very accurate

author: Bruce Duncan
comment: Excellent app. Updated you on parcels progress continually and accurately giving plenty of warning when delivery due. I normally uninstall from my phone after all deliveries are made and no more expected. (Tends to use too much of my limited phones memory)

App works great. Unfortunately the live chat is totally unsupported. 1st sign of a real world issue an live chat suddenly becomes automated responses .. AFTER a real person respond initially. Call back request autorised by app but 6 hours l8tr I'm still waiting to vent at them.

author: Julian Cox
comment: Has shown most DPD deliveries, but not all.   At some point app decided that local store was default - not my choice - so got to collect from there and DPD incapable of changing it even though package not even in the system yet.  Not customer oriented!

author: Damien McGlade
comment: Please sort your app out. I can't view pending deliveries. DPD is one of if not the best delivery company I've used. I've never missed a delivery cos I know exactly when they will drop off. Thanks DPD I wish Amazon would use you for prime.

Excellent service great app. Previous reviews say chat doesn't work but I had no issue at all with anything. Could see drivers name, photo and got updates at all main parts of the delivery process. Final update gave me a time window in which it would be delivered and it was spot on time. Even chat staff were great. Would definitely recommend.

author: Jtuner Z
comment: By far the best delivery company out there. Track your package right up to your door, loads of different options on how to deal with your package if not in. Now i make sure companies i order from use dpd for their deliveries otherwise i'm not interested.

author: Robert Sinclair
comment: Totally pointless. App says I'm the next delivery. Driver appears to want to go everywhere but my door. Driver has been literally minutes from my door. Time slot promised is hopelessly optimistic. I finished work early to coincide with delivery time. Shouldn't have bothered.

author: J Law
comment: The app has a mini map of where the driver is and shows how many people are in front of you. I have a tricky building to deliver too so this feature was invaluable so I could run down when he was near to collect the parcel. Parcel showed delivery from 8am and then at 11am it updated to an hour window. Very very helpful.

Great app. Perfect for tracking your deliveries. The interface however is a bit messy and looks a bit dated. You don't really get much else that you get from the emails that you receive from them, if you choose to get them. Overall, however worth the download if you use DPD often as it sorts your orders and deliveries for you.

author: Roberto Altieri
comment: The app does its job but DPD service isn't good. The parcels that were supposed to be delivered the 22nd dec will arrive the 27th. When I spoke with the customer service they told me that DPD hadn't received them yet but actually the app says the contrary. And after waiting about 3 hours to talk to the customer service they told me that they are too busy and they won't deliver them on time. They delivered the parcels late and now they won't wait for me to return from the holiday to collect it. They will return them to the sender.

author: victor ahiaba
comment: They just make sure you get it by all means and in scheduled time earlier communicated! The delivery guy kept calling to be sure it was delivered as promised.  Edit: The app has been improved greatly. The real time delivery process is out of this world. DPD!

author: I'm right You're wrong
comment: I was able to verify my account (one mobile number and three emails) within 10 mins. History came up then deliveries due shortly after. Super easy to use. Easy 5 stars

author: Amy Strong
comment: The driver was very friendly even though he'd had a long day and still had a smile on his face. It came within the specified time frame. Couldn't be happier with the service. The app is extremely easy to use and understand too

author: Pawel Oronowicz
comment: Cannot register. When I enter the PIN sent by text I first get the message "A problem has occurred", and when I retry the PIN, "PIN not recognised". Tried to request a new PIN several times but it happens every time. I also see a message prompting me to verify my email address but no email has arrived in my inbox. Well done.

author: Sarah Harris
comment: Get notifications ok but app won't open properly. Says 'connection slower than normal' then when I does open its says it cannot upload parcels so cannot see when due.

author: steven griffin
comment: It works well enough but could be better. Crashes a few times when updating a new package. Sometimes the app doesn't update after I receive a push notification and I have to close then re-open it

author: Deirdre Craig
comment: Used dpd and app lots and always reliable 4me. Very handy if there's a glitch, dpd always do their best to hurry your delivery while informing you by app. 5stars to dpd and app IMO. Glitches happen, it's how they're handled that tells...

author: leemank23
comment: I like the different options you can set in the app especially to state for a delivery not to be made during school times. The timing to receiving the parcel seems to be a couple of mins out but nothing is perfect. Overall I would highly recommend it.

author: Andronk
comment: Useless app. Contains less information about my delivery than the web page I was on before. Also if you use the chat facility you speak to a robot who claims to be a real person when asked, but clearly is a robot.

author: Martin Beecroft
comment: Despite previous feedback the address database is still woefully out of date and no means of. manually inputting address therefore the app is completely useless to me.

author: Jason Hanna
comment: This is a great app and I always get great service from DPD.and the drivers. Being kept upto date of when my item is to be delivered is what like and been able to give options if I'm unable to make or be at home to receive the goods . well done to DPD and thank

author: Iain Garden
comment: The app could be brilliant but falls short. It tells you it's coming and gives you an hour slot, but only on the day (not say the night before). Second, it doesn't tell you where it's being delivered (I have 2 main locations). Third, it doesn't tell you who the supplier is. Fine, if you are only expecting one delivery around that time, otherwise it's not good enough. I love the options for redelivery though.

author: Sherry MacBeth
comment: Useless! I've had several deliveries in the past week and not one has shown up in the delivery section.

author: Graham Harcombe
comment: Real show stopper on this app. I have tried to use it 5 or 6 times. On each occasion it says, "wait a moment, connection is slower than usual". But it never resolves and I do have a fast connection.

author: Maureen Porcelli
comment: The facility to track your parcel right up until delivery is second to non. Dpd  have never let me down. When given your 1 hour time slot on the morning  of your delivery they tend to arrive at the beginning of the slot so delivery is done and dusted. I recommend to all my friends and colleagues. The driver greg is very pleasant and his picture is on the app so you know it's him. Love the app as well always works on my android phone I have used this facility for a long time now. Best delivery service in this country in my opinion. App is brilliant too.
Next day delivery but they will say you miss the delivery.  Awful . I'm not happy with this app.

author: Simon Cartwright
comment: It's a good app but what I found incredibly frustrating and was when it said the driver is 45 minutes away and is on delivery 1 / 5. I am 5th. Then I get an email to say I've missed the delivery.  I work 10 minutes from home and wasn't even given a chance to go back in time due to the high inaccuracy of this app.

author: Yannis Troullinos
comment: I have moved to a new development and although it finds my flat correctly, it gives an error that there are no neighbours and then loads forever at the selection of pickup stores, thus not letting me set up the address. So, it is useless at the moment.

author: Sam Tailby
comment: Top marks for this app and the service behind it. Other delivery companies need to aim for this standard of service. Takes all guess work out of parcel delivery.  Which today is a huge business!

author: Stacy Griffiths
comment: App is useful and easy to navigate. Would be great if it allowed me to manually input a neighbour to avoid. Only gives me the option to select from my street which isn't helpful when you live on the corner.

author: Steve Hurry
comment: I had big problems with this app after the last update. Errored or hung when opened. Had to uninstall and reinstall from scratch. Now works fine.

author: Randolph Dube
comment: What good is the app if the service behind it is an Ai bot that can't tell me anything more than the human would and still not receive my parcel at not 1 but 2 alloted times with several changes throughout the day? This app serves to simply highlight you inability to provide customer care by a passing on your human call centre and replacing it with tech. Poor customer support business process model with a useless app to boot.
